| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | [disintegration](/wiki/Disintegration "Disintegration")                                  |

| A pursuer:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has no hands.
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                          |

The **pursuer** is a monster that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"). Its only means of attack is an explosion similar to [spheres](/wiki/Sphere "Sphere") that deals a decent amount of [dark](/wiki/Dark "Dark") damage.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Pursuer\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Pursuer

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
e pursuer (No tile)
Difficulty 3
Attacks Explode 2d10 dark
e pursuer (No tile)
Difficulty 3
Attacks

Explode 2d10 dark

Base level 2
Base experience 31
Speed 13
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size small
Resistances disintegration, poison
Resistances conveyed disintegration

A pursuer:

  • can fly.
  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no hands.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • cannot be tamed.

The pursuer is a monster that appears in dNetHack. Its only means of attack is an explosion similar to spheres that deals a decent amount of dark damage.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Pursuer&oldid=140925"
